prayer_creation.name: Creation Domain Effect
prayer_creation.effect: You create a 5 wall of stone within 10 squares of you.

hands_of_the_maker.name: Hands of the Maker

option.name: Hands of the Maker
option.description: Craft objects with the power of your mind!

hands_of_the_maker.flavor: Craft objects with the power of your mind!
hands_of_the_maker.effect: You create a mundane object no larger than size 1S that you hold. If you use this feature again or stop holding the object, it disappears.
